itemInfo.itemDesc: An essence extracted from Fruit of the Sun, a fruit obtained at a low rate through Farming. It's used as an ingredient in Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: Can be made by combining other ingredients with Fruit of the Sun using Alchemy.

item.name: Fruit of the Sun
item.desc: An ingredient used in Alchemy that can be obtained through farming. It can be used directly or refined into an essence for use.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained through Farming in a Garden, but only rarely.

item.name: Fruit of the Sun
item.desc: An ingredient used in Alchemy that can be obtained through farming. It can be used directly or refined into an essence for use.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained through Farming in a Garden, but only rarely.

item.name: Pine Sap
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from Pine Trees with a Fluid Collector.

item.name: Trace of the Earth
item.desc: A material used for Crafting equipment.\nIt can be Excavated at Ancient Stone Chamber.

item.name: Arrow Mushroom
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used as an ingredient in Alchemy and Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Forest of Plunder. Arrow Mushrooms can be Gathered using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 â€» Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!
